Thank_yous_are_nice_Gift_cards_are_even_.message: Thank yous are nice. Gift cards are even better. Honey Gold is our rewards program where you can earn gift cards from your favorite stores. Once you earn {HONEYGOLD} Gold, redeem it for a {MINAMOUNTTOREDEEM} gift card.

We’ll credit {GOLDVALUE} ($${GOLDCURRENCYVALUE} value) to your Honey account as soon as {STORENAME} confirms your purchase of at least {MINVALUE}.

When_you_shop_at_any_of_our_5500_partici.message: When you shop at any of our 5,500+ participating sites, you’ll earn a percentage back in Honey Gold. Redeem 1,000 Gold for a $$10 gift card from some of your favorite stores.
